items.title: Share buybacks by listed companies is a bad idea
items.description: The best way to boost share price is through business performance, not financial engineering. Buybacks, in particular, are unfair to the patient investor who stays invested. If a firm has surplus cash and no meaningful avenue of deployment, a special dividend is a clean option to return money to shareholders

items.title: FTX sues Binance and its former CEO for $1.8 billion
items.description: The lawsuit relates to Binance’s sale of its stake in Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX, which it acquired in 2019 but then negotiated to sell back to FTX in July 2021.
